Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its worth to you, I understand it's valued at $8,000. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer includes a comprehensive consultation on how best to integrate the product into your existing processes, ensuring maximum efficiency and return on investment. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
